entries.meaning: Having a smooth, silk-like, reflective (shiny) surface.

examples: The supermarket glossies are full of celebrity gossip and fad diets.
Black and white 8- × 10-inch glossies are best, but 5- × 7-inch is okay too. Place photos on top of cardboard when mailing. Don't tape or paper-clip because doing so can ruin the photo.

entries.meaning: (film, informal) A film depicting people with glamorous lifestyles.
examples: Anna Magnani has been making Hollywood glossies recently, so it was good to see her back again in a native Italian production, The Last Temptation, in which with great artistry and all her usual power she played a Nun who finds a woman's and even a mother's heart beating strongly beneath her 'sister's' habit.
